Feb 8 (Reuters) - My Size Inc MYSZ.TA:

  • MYSIZE ACQUIRES ORGAD, AN OMNICHANNEL E-COMMERCE PLATFORM WITH A PRESENCE ON AMAZON.COM

  • MY SIZE - UNDER DEAL TERMS, MYSIZE AGREED TO PAY TO ORGAD SELLERS CASH CONSIDERATION OF UP TO $1 MILLION IN 3 INSTALLMENTS OVER A PERIOD OF 3 YEARS

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: MYSZ.TA
